data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Animals 2 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Animals 2


This token pack contains 30 tokens. This pack contains A variety of animals, from cute to deadly.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Bear
  • Bird
  • Bull
  • Celestial Deer
  • Chicken
  • Deer
  • Dire Bear
  • Dog
  • Goat, 2 Headed
  • Grizzly Bear
  • Horse
  • Huskie
  • Jackal
  • Jotun Auroch
  • 2 Macaque Monkeys
  • Octopus
  • Owl
  • Pig
  • Raging Bull
  • Rhino
  • Rhinoceros
  • Royal Eagle
  • Skunk
  • Tiger
  • Turtle, Giant
  • Walrus
  • White Gecko
  • Winter Wolf
  • Whale Orca

Released on April 05, 2017. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.2.2 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
